UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Functional Analyses of Three Targeted DNA Antimicrobial Peptides Derived from Goats.
Literature.Author: Wang A, Zhou M, Chen Q, Jin HZ, Xu G, Guo R, Wang J, Lai R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:2.13%  Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:10% Cytotoxicity=200 µg/ml
